Package com.linecorp.armeria.server.file

Class HttpFileService

java.lang.Object
com.linecorp.armeria.server.AbstractHttpService
com.linecorp.armeria.server.file.FileService
com.linecorp.armeria.server.file.HttpFileService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Unwrappable, HttpService, Service<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse>
@Deprecated
public final class HttpFileService
extends FileService
Deprecated.
Use FileService.
An HttpService that serves static files from a file system.

  • Method Details

    • forFileSystem

      @Deprecated public static HttpFileService forFileSystem​(String rootDir)
      Deprecated.
      Use FileService.of(Path).
      Creates a new HttpFileService for the specified rootDir in an O/S file system.

    • forFileSystem

      @Deprecated public static HttpFileService forFileSystem​(Path rootDir)
      Deprecated.
      Use FileService.of(Path).
      Creates a new HttpFileService for the specified rootDir in an O/S file system.

    • forClassPath

      @Deprecated public static HttpFileService forClassPath​(String rootDir)
      Deprecated.
      Use FileService.of(ClassLoader, String).
      Creates a new HttpFileService for the specified rootDir in the current class path.

    • forClassPath

      @Deprecated public static HttpFileService forClassPath​(ClassLoader classLoader, String rootDir)
      Deprecated.
      Use FileService.of(ClassLoader, String).
      Creates a new HttpFileService for the specified rootDir in the current class path.

    • forVfs

      @Deprecated public static HttpFileService forVfs​(HttpVfs vfs)
      Deprecated.
      Use FileService.of(HttpVfs).
      Creates a new HttpFileService for the specified HttpVfs.
